headline: U.S. stock futures pare deeper losses after Russia shelling sparks fire at Ukraine nuclear plant
content: U.S. stock-index futures were trading lower on Friday, but off the lows following reports of a fire at Europe's largest nuclear power plant, in Ukraine that was later extinguished.

headline: Stocks, Futures Fall on Ukraine as Havens Advance: Markets Wrap
content: (Bloomberg) -- Stocks fell Friday along with European and U.S. equity futures while havens including sovereign bonds rose after Ukrainian officials said Russian troops shelled a major nuclear power plant, briefly igniting a fire.Most Read from BloombergNuclear Plant Fire Contained After Ukraine Says Russia AttackedUkraine Update: Fire Near Nuclear Power Plant Now ContainedRussia’s Rating Cut to Junk; Talks on Tap: Ukraine UpdateGerman Authorities Said to Deny Seizing Usmanov YachtResignation Set

headline: Dow Jones Futures Fall, Slash Losses On Ukraine Nuclear Power Plant News
content: Futures dived, pared losses amid reports of a fire at a huge Ukraine nuclear power plant facility, under attack by Russian troops.

headline: Global Markets Fall on Concerns About Ukraine
content: U.S. equity futures retreated and global stock indexes fell sharply as investor concerns mounted about Russia’s intensifying military campaign in Ukraine.

headline: Russia Keeps Stock Trading Closed in Nation’s Longest Shutdown
content: (Bloomberg) -- The Russian stock market will be closed to trading for a fifth straight day, marking a record in the country’s modern history, in a continuing bid to stave off the impact of global sanctions for domestic investors.Most Read from BloombergNuclear Plant Fire Contained After Ukraine Says Russia AttackedUkraine Update: Fire Near Nuclear Power Plant Now ContainedRussia’s Rating Cut to Junk; Talks on Tap: Ukraine UpdateGerman Authorities Said to Deny Seizing Usmanov YachtResignation Set
